summary: This code snippet introduces the Pomegranate library, which offers advanced features for Hidden Markov Model (HMM) training and prediction with a variety of models available.

details.comment: This code snippet introduces the Pomegranate library, which offers advanced features for Hidden Markov Model (HMM) training and prediction with a variety of models available.
details.content:
# this library goes way advanced than hmmlearn/seqlearn
# it provides convenient methods for training and prediction.
# also lots of different models
# https://pomegranate.readthedocs.io/en/latest/HiddenMarkovModel.html
